body_html:
I think when the GPU runs out of its memory, the weights and maps storage is shifted onto the RAM.
I observed this when I trained a 50 Layer ResNet on my GT 755m(running on 97%) laptop with 16GB(running on 32%) of RAM. Never faced any issues.

body:
I think when the GPU runs out of its memory, the weights and maps storage is shifted onto the RAM. 
I observed this when I trained a 50 Layer ResNet on my GT 755m(running on 97%) laptop with 16GB(running on 32%) of RAM. Never faced any issues.
